newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SIMEX Nikkei futures closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: SIMEX Nikkei futures closed for holiday.

text.p: SIMEX Nikkei futures were not traded on Monday due to a holiday in Japan. Trading will resume on Tuesday.

On Friday, the lead Nikkei 225 June contract ended 210 points higher at 19,570 as players covered their positions ahead of the long weekend in Japan and the release of the U.S. non-farm payrolls report.
The lead Nikkei 225 June contract ended 210 points higher at 19,570 on light volume of 12,080 lots.
Dealers said trading was thin and technically driven, with Nikkei futures gaining on the back of weakness in Japanese government bond and Euroyen futures.
